string.text: Anyone who receives this, please help! We're trapped at the factory! The Military has us surrounded, we're outnumbered, and out-gunned! We need help, now!
I'm trapped in the courtyard! Help me, brothers, please!
I've already given everything I had...

Marked One, the Military have absolute control here, and they're not just going to let you leave. I'll let the Barkeep know you've been here...\nThey're bringing in reinforcements by helicopter. The building's completely surrounded, so you've got to get out of here now. Good luck...

Strelok, this is worthless news. Fang was lost. You didn't find him, and your journey to the centre was in vain.\nNow, back to matters of business. For whom, and where, to search?, I know... a phantom...
